Chapter.Label: The Small Algebra Package
Chapter.Heading: Small DeductiveAlgebra Package
Chapter.Section:
Accessing Small DeductiveAlgebra AllSmallDeductiveAlgebra is an accessor function for accessing the complete list of non-isomorphic deductivealgebra models from orders 2 to 6.
The models are generated by Mace4 , using the definitions in Section .

Definition of DeductiveAlgebra formulas(DeductiveAlgebra).
x*(y*x)=0.
(x*(y*z))*((x*y)*(x*z)) = 0.
0*x=0 -> x=0.
end_of_list.
Dependency This package has dependencies on the Magmaut package.
